short_summary: Car spares for the Department of National Defence
description: Item list, including details of spares, their quantities, delivery points by January 12, 2024 and other essential details
full_summary:
# *Government Tender Announcement for SMP - Spares - Trailers*

## Project Overview {#overall}
The Department of National Defence has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of various automotive and light truck maintenance and repair items. The requirement is for 36 items, detailed below, which must be delivered to identified depots in Quebec and Alberta.

## Items Required {#items}
Below are the items to be procured:

*   **Spring and Bolt Assembly**
    *   Part number: 8720331
    *   Quantity: 33
    *   Unit of issue: Each
    *   Delivery location: 25 CFSD, Montreal, Quebec
*   **Nonmetallic Bushing**
    *   Part number: 8489-0020
    *   Quantity: 200
    *   Unit of issue: Each
    *   Delivery location: 25 CFSD, Montreal, Quebec
*   **Knob**
    *   Part number: 95 1/2-20
    *   Quantity: 33
    *   Unit of issue: Each
    *   Delivery location: 25 CFSD, Montreal, Quebec
*   And 32 other items, listed below...

## Tender Details {#tender}

*   **Tender Number: W8486-249358/A**
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-10-12
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-22T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

## Evaluation Criteria {#criteria}

*   The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Submissions {#submissions}

*   Submissions must be made electronically to the email address DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca.
*   The solicitation document and related information can be found on the CanadaBuys website.

## Language of the Tender Document {#document_language}

*   The tender document may be presented in either English or French.

## Other Important Information {#other_information}

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Suppliers may request a debriefing of the results of the request for submissions process.

Note: I have removed a lot of extraneous data that were irrelevant
